title: SKULL AND BONES™ PREMIUM EDITION
description: Premium Edition Includes: The Ballad of Bloody Bones Collection, two missions,* digital artbook and soundtrack,** and Smuggler Pass token. Enter the perilous paradise of Skull and Bones™, inspired by the Indian Ocean during the Golden Age of Piracy, as you overcome the odds and rise from an outcast to an infamous pirate. *You must have reached Infamy Tier: Buccaneer to unlock the missions. **Access the digital artbook and soundtrack upon game release on the official Skull and Bones website: https:\\skullandbonesgame.com\digital-artbook Persistent internet connection is required.
